title: Can Distributism Answer Game B's Questions? pt 9 Envy and Economics
description:
When envy enters the economic discussion, it is usually as an accusation levied against those who have less in terms of their attitude toward those who have more. But Catholic teaching in this area expands that common understanding.

Academic Agent: How Does Amazon Work? https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qCkxsfCLJLo 

How to pronounce my last name: The "c" is silent just to confuse people.
Bringing Joseph Ratzinger (Benedict XVI) into the converZation in Paul VanderKlay's little corner of the internet.
